page.t: Select number of tabs. Can be changed anytime.
Just after 'Stations and All ships' tab
Select at which position the tabs will be placed within 'Property owned' main tab
Enter name of first custom tab
Enter name of second custom tab
Enter name of third custom tab
Select the tab icon. You can check the appearance of the available icons below.
This element must be checked if you want to reset custom tabs data.
This action will move all player ships and stations back to the 'Stations and All ships' property tab. It does not affect tabs configuration.
If you want to clear the data - nake sure that checkbox is checked
Clone mode will leave property in 'Stations and All Ships' tab, while move mode will transfer it to a custom tab
